title: Lovely Popsicle Cell Phone Ring Holder 360° Rotation Back Stand Finger Ring Metal Grip Polished Metal Finger Kickstand Compatible with All Smartphones
features: [High-quality Material]: The phone ring holder is made of premium quality alloy, the surface pattern would never fade or peel off.Polished ring grip and smooth edge endow no worries of scratches to your fingers.

[Multi-angle Rotation]:The finger ring grip offers 360° rotating support and 180° folds for easy portability.Flexible angle rotation, feel free to adjust your favorite viewing angle to use your phone.

[Sturdy Adhesive]: The back of phone ring holder adopts powerfully adhesive sticker, which can be firmly adhered to the back of the mobile phone. Fingers buckle the holder ring, don't worry about the phone slipping when operating with one hand.

[Easy to Use]: Clean the back of the phone and dry it thoroughly.And tear off our product protective film.Finally stick it on the back of the phone and press gently. (Please Note: Cannot support wireless charging)

[Multi-functional Phone Ring Holder]: Using this phone ring holder by gripping the phone grip not only anti-drop, but also can set your hands free when do other things.You can put your phone on the table, kitchen counter to watch movies, listen to music, make video chat calls and etc on.
description: Color: As shown in the images
Package Includes : 1 x  Lovely Cell Phone Ring Holder
1: Clean the back of the phone and dry it thoroughly.
2: Tear off our product protective film.
3. Stick it on the back of the phone and press gently.
*Don't worry about the phone slipping when you operate it with one hand, the premium quality is more durable.
*NOTICE: Better to stick on the phone case cover rather than on the phone back directly, to avoid the sticking is not firm.
*After the installation is complete, please wait 12-24 hours before using.
